A mug with a built-in coffee grinder: This mug would have a small grinder built into the handle, allowing users to grind their coffee beans directly into their morning brew. The grinder could be powered by a small battery or through induction heating, ensuring that the coffee is always freshly ground.

A mug with a temperature control system: This mug would have a built-in temperature control system that allows users to adjust the temperature of their coffee to their liking. Whether you prefer your coffee hot, warm, or iced, this mug would allow you to achieve the perfect temperature with ease.

A mug with a built-in strainer: This mug would have a small strainer built into the handle, making it easy to separate the coffee grounds from the liquid. This would eliminate the need for a separate strainer, making the mug more convenient and easy to use.

A mug with a built-in frother: This mug would have a small frother built into the handle, allowing users to froth their milk to the perfect consistency for their coffee. Whether you prefer a flat white, cappuccino, or latte, this mug would make it easy to create the perfect drink at home.

A mug with a built-in timer: This mug would have a small timer built into the handle, allowing users to set a timer for their coffee. Whether you're in a rush or just want to make sure your coffee doesn't get too cold, this mug would make it easy to keep track of time.
